articles.title: Pfizer submits data for 3rd dose approval in US - New Straits Times
articles.description: WASHINGTON: Pfizer and BioNTech on Monday submitted preliminary clinical data to US health authorities as part of their effort to seek authorisation for a third dose of their Covid-19 vaccine for all Americans.
